phrases: Rikka Park Meeting Center - Hotel Elnath
Le Wolfe Black Academy Student Council President: Dirk Eberweine
Allekant Academy Student Council President: Shuma Sakon
Jie Long 7th Academy Student Council President: Fan Shinlu
Garrardworth Academy Student Council President: Ernest Fairclough
As always, you are right on time.
Seidoukan Academy Student Council President: Claudia Enfield
Good afternoon, everyone.
I am happy to see you all looking so well.
All right, since we are all here, why do not we get started?
Oh, but...
Oh, she is in the middle of her European tour.
How fitting for a world-famous diva!
Seems like there is a lot on her plate.
Not that it makes any difference whether she is around or not, a little brat like that!
I would appreciate it if you could refrain from insulting reps from other schools,
Overlord of the Double Swords.
How many times has that bitch from Queenvale been absent now?
I just told you not to talk like that.
Interesting.
Want to take me on, Lord Holy Knight?
Look at your little kiddie toy.
I see you are as tight as ever, little punks.
But you would better stop that childish horseplay now.
Otherwise, I will start itching to join the fray myself.
I suppose there is no defying the princess's mediation efforts.
By the way, Claudia...
What is it?
I am hearing rumors that Seidoukan and Allekant agreed to co-develop a new type of Lux.
So what is up with that?
Oh, my, news does travel fast.
It is true that we will be sending our engineers to Allekant.
You vixen!
Secret deals between schools are prohibited under the Stella Charter.
In the first place, the technological difference between Seidoukan and Allekant is like night and day.
Yes, it is like saying, Please help yourselves to as much of our technology as you like.
Are you sure you are okay with that, Allekant?
Uh, actually, all I did was give the go-ahead.
So I do not know any of the details.
There seems to be some kind of misunderstanding.
This is not a secret deal,
but rather an official collaboration between Seidoukan Academy and Allekant Academy.
The details will be made public eventually.
So you are saying this deal was made on equal terms?
Of course.
In return for the use of Allekant's facilities,
we will be assuming 70 of the RD fees, after all.
Right, speaking of Seidoukan,
they had some internal strife the other day, and had to mobilize the Shadow Stars.
Now, could that have anything to do with...
Whatever are you talking about?
You scheming bitch!
All right, I think that is enough of this topic.
Then let us wait for the official announcement.
All right, once again, about today's agenda...
Uh, excuse me...
Actually, uh...
I know this is sudden,
but there is something I would like to add to today's discussion.
What?
Now you are joining the fray?
Aha, what could that be?
Uh, what I would like to propose to you all
is the handling of artificial intelligence in Asterisk, as well as during the Festas.
Lightning Blade Speed
If I do not hurry, Julis is going to kill me!
Are you all right?
Yes... I am fine.
Uh...
Sorry about that.
I was not paying attention.
N-No, I am the one who should be apologizing.
I think there is something stuck in your hair.
Where?
Where?
Okay, hold still.
Um...
Thank you very much.
Uh...
Kirin!
What are you up to over there?!
Y-Yes, sir!
I am sorry!
S-See you later!
Uh... right.
Julis?
Burst into bloom...
LIVINGSTON DAISY
Livingston Daisy!
Go!
Now that was a nonchalantly ridiculous stunt.
But how do you plan to evade my next attack?
Then how about something like this?
Come out... Gloriosa!
GLORIOSA
Amagiri Shinmei Style, Second Sword!
Ten Linked Thistles!
TEN LINKED THISTLES
I thought I had you today for sure.
No, to tell you the truth, that last one was a close call.
You have got a whole arsenal of moves, huh?
M-Mmm.
I suppose so.
So how are you feeling physically?
Yeah, well, I think I am good for up to 3 minutes.
I see.
Assuming you can go full blast for that long,
I am sure we can find a way to handle anyone at my level.
But there cannot be that many students more powerful than you.
I am happy for that vote of confidence from you,
but there must be more than you can count on both hands and feet.
That many?
Garrardworth's student council president is such an able swordsman, he is known as the Holy Knight.
His counterpart at Jie Long is said to be a beast of epic proportions.
Although neither of them are old enough to take part in the Festas.
Oh, right, there is another famous contestant that I have heard of.
The one who became the second person in history to win Lindbels Festas last year.
I think it was Le Wolfe's...
Elenshquigall Ophelia.
Oh, yeah, that is the one!
Julis?
Oh...
Sorry.
Now, then.
Despite all that, we do have one thing in our favor.
And that is the fact that your skills are not yet well-known.
The fact that you are wielding the Ser Veresta may be public knowledge,
but knowing this sword's power still will not do anyone any good.
It would be even more ideal if you could use it without unsealing it.
Yeah...
But unless I am at full power, this thing will not acknowledge me as its wielder.
At any rate, we only have one month left before the Phoenix Festa.
Do not go tipping your hand in any useless duels!
Roger that.
No fair!
Riessfeld, you are totally monopolizing Ayato.
I know you have been shutting yourself into a room alone with Ayato after school,
indulging in unspeakable acts...
I have got you dead to rights!
Do not slander me!
We have been training for the Phoenix Festa, that is all!
Lester.
I see you are out of the hospital.
Well, yeah.
So what brings you here today?
And with Saya, of all people?
I just picked up this little squirt on the way.
Who are you calling a little squirt?!
Well, but I do owe you big time.
Thanks.
Well, uh, about that incident with Silas...
There is no denying that you saved me.
So... you know...
A-Anyway, you did me a solid!
That is it!
Uh, sure!
Oh, so you are all here!
Ah, so this is the Seidoukan training room, eh?
Wow, it is gorgeous!
Do not get too carried away, Ernesta.
Allow me to introduce you all.
This is Camilla Pareto of Allekant Academy.
And this is Ernesta Kuhne.
Of Allekant?
Seidoukan and Allekant are about to embark on a joint venture, developing a new type of Lux.
And so they are here today to sign the contract.
Hello.
So that is what this is about?
What are you talking about?
In return for not charging Allekant with the Silas incident,
they must have secured their technological collaboration.
My, what are you talking about?
Well, whatever.
But...
Why did you bring those two here?
Right, because...
Oh, yes, because I said I wanted to see for myself!
Honestly, I just had to see him with my own two eyes!
The young swordsman who shredded every one of my little puppets!
Heh, heh!
You wretch!
Step away from Ayato this minute!
Hmm, hmm...
I see, I see...
Yes!
Not bad at all!
I think I like you!
Uh, look...
But things will not work out so well for you next time.
What did you just...
What do you think you are doing?!
Thieving cat.
Must be destroyed!
So scary!
So scary!
It was just a little greeting, that is all!
I am so sorry.
What you just saw was Ernesta's true nature.
I apologize on her behalf.
Now this is quite unique.
Three Manadites, forcefully linked together.
It is a design concept that I have not seen in ages.
Correct.
How did you know?
Because that is what I specialize in.
Still, you cannot really call it practical.
This was dismissed over ten years ago as a half-baked technology.
You are forced to deploy the Meteo Arts non-stop
to boost Lux output by pouring Prana into the Manadites.
The Meteo Arts, huh?
Therefore, an interval is needed between each attack.
But it does not look like that flaw's been rectified.
That is true.
Even so, I will not let you get away with insulting my father's gun.
I demand that you take that back!
Oh, so are you Dr. Sasamiya's daughter, then?
What if I am?
Then I cannot retract my statement, all the more.
Because of Dr. Sasamiya's renegade tendencies,
he was cast out of Allekant, as well as our faction, Ferrovius.
As the leader of the latter, I cannot acknowledge his perverse notions.
Now, then, my guests.
Why do not we get back to business?
Good idea.
Pardon me.
Hold up.
I insist that you retract your statement!
Well, but Camilla can be stubborn, you know?
Well, if you are really determined, your only hope would be to force her.
You mean I should duel her?
Please, no way would she accept a challenge!
But see, we will be taking part in the upcoming Phoenix Festa, you know?
Come on, Ernesta.
Coming!
All right, see you later, guys!
Ayato...
What is up?
I am going to fight in the Phoenix Festa, too.
I have made up my mind.
But it is a tag team tournament, you know.
Who are you going to team up with?
With you, of course.
Do not be ridiculous!
This guy is my partner!
No monopolies.
I am the one who asked him first!
Ouch ouch ouch!
Come on, you two!
Great.
Just great.
Oh, boy, now that was a rare sight, seeing you like that.
You know, baiting that blue-haired girl and all...
I was not really baiting her.
That was just my frank opinion.
Anyway, what do you think of him?
I have to say I would like just a little more data.
Our prez did a good job, helping us prepare for the Festa.
Now the only thing we have to worry about is him.
Are you planning another one of your stunts?
Well, you know me, I will do anything!
In order to realize my dream, that is...
Allekant is divided into two groups.
The research class that develops Luxes,
and the practical skills class that fights with them in the Festas.
And the research class is the one with more clout.
Yeah?
Not only that, but the research class itself has its cliques.
FERROVIUS TENORIO PYGMALION METHUSELAH SONNET
ALLEKANT RESEARCH CLASS
And they are always fighting over RD facilities and the most promising students.
And right now, Ferrovius has the most clout of all.
FERROVIUS
I see.
I already told you, that is not your concern, Kirin!
B-But, Uncle...
I do not recall ever giving you permission to talk back, either!
That is enough!
Who the hell are you?
I do not know what this is about, but I do not approve of raising a hand to a girl.
I was only disciplining her as her uncle.
Outsiders should stay out of family matters!
Uncle?
I am Koichiro Toudou.
Kirin
Toudou here is my niece.
Now you know, so get out of my way.
Anyway...
You Genestella kids are pretty much immune to anything of this level, are not you?
That does not mean that we do not feel pain.
What is your name?
Ayato Amagiri.
Amagiri...
A rank-and-filer who is not even listed in the Named Cults, eh?
Fine!
If you have a problem with my way of doing things,
then tell me what you want me to do.
I am telling you that I will comply.
Just speak up.
Do not ever get violent with her again.
Can you promise me that?
Sure, I can do that.
Only if you win a duel, that is.
Duel?
Your opponent is... her.
Uncle!
Kirin!
You are not actually defying me, are you?!
No...
Of course not.
Fine, then.
If you defeat that Ser Veresta, it will pad your resume further.
I am so sorry.
challenge you, Amagiri-senpai, to a duel.
N-No, wait, why should I have to fight you?
Please, Senpai.
If you decline, then that will be the end of it.
And if I do, what will happen to you?
What is going to happen to you?
I do not care what happens to me.
Because there is nothing I can do about it.
In that case, I do not think I can decline.
You are very kind, Amagiri-senpai.
Then I have no choice.
I cannot afford to lose this duel, either.
I accept your challenge.
Kirin, do not parry that Ogre Lux of his!
He will slice right through your sword!
Here I come!
Amagiri-senpai, you are very powerful.
You surprised me.
Well, I could say the same of you.
I told him not to get into any meaningless duels!
That idiot!
The pressure's on Ayato?
Well, well, if it is not Her Highness.
Yabuki?
Hey, is not this a spectacle?
That Amagiri's totally been hiding his true skills from us!
But it does not look good for him.
Well, of course not.
He is up against the notorious Lightning Blade Speed, right?
Still, looks like Amagiri's still not going all-out with the Ser Veresta.
Toudou's been dodging every blow without once receiving an attack.
So he can actually read the defense and offense patterns?
Never mind that!
How long has this duel been going on?!
Maybe 4, 5 minutes, I guess?
Amazing...
I never thought it would be like this.
Dammit, I am out of time...
You can read her sword skills.
Wait till the last second to dodge and come out swinging!
He is panicking?
But why?
I will dodge this one, too!
End of duel!
Winner, Kirin Toudou!
The ones that are used to fighting elsewhere always end up doing that!
It is over, huh?
Let us go.
Yes, sir!
Um... I am really sorry!
Hey...
We are getting out of here right now.
You do not have all that much time before your limit's up.
Uh, right.
You have some explaining to do later.
What possible reason could you have
for dueling the student who is ranked 1 at our school?
That girl's...
our...
Rank 1?
Ayato...
Oh, to think that my Ayato actually lost!
You have to hand it to Seidoukan's Rank 1, Ms. Kirin Toudou!
Apparently, she is not called Lightning Blade Speed for nothing.
Episode 6 - The True Face of the Girl
Oh, but I have not quite gone down in defeat myself.
